system.usedWith: SP/Bolt: Hand Cannons, Heavy Stubbers, Bolt Weapons
system.damageOrEffect: If target takes any damage, make Toughness test with -10 per point of damage taken. If fail, take additional 2d10 R damage, (ignores AP/T)

description.value: Damage/Effect: If target takes any damage, make Toughness test with -10 per point of damage taken. If fail, take additional 2d10 R damage, (ignores AP/T)
